#labels Featured
In order to use the Maven Repository for flapjack you can just add the following to your pom.xml file.

{{{
<repositories>
        <repository>
            <id>flapjack-release</id>
            <name>Local Maven repository of releases</name>
            <url>dav:http://flapjack.googlecode.com/svn/mvn-repo/released</url>
        </repository>
        <repository>
            <id>flapjack-snapshot</id>
            <name>Local Maven repository of snapshots</name>
            <url>dav:http://flapjack.googlecode.com/svn/mvn-repo/snapshot</url>
        </repository>
</repositories>
}}}
